competencyPoints.title: Is flexible and embraces change wholeheartedly

behaviors.description: Is curious and takes initiative to explore alternatives to optimize deliverables
Welcomes change and guides the team to adapt
Encourages improvements in work practices, and supports their implementation; shares experiences with others to ensure smooth transition
Identifies opportunities to drive change and enables teams to lead such initiatives
Proactively prepares the organization for future shifts in business environment

competencyPoints.title: Assesses complex and dynamic situations swiftly, makes sound decisions, and ensures speedy execution with accountability to timelines

behaviors.description: Quickly realigns actions with changing situations while adhering to timelines
Equips team to prioritize tasks, gathers essential information and makes swift decisions with minimal supervision
Helps teams to foresee and overcome obstacles; makes informed decisions promptly to ensure timely execution
Rapidly identifies challenges, leverages organization awareness and makes quick decisions to meet milestones
Holds self and the leaders accountable for driving execution excellence in a complex and dynamic environment

competencyPoints.title: Seeks and accepts feedback, and responds with a change in attitude and approach to drive impact

behaviors.description: Actively listens to feedback and makes changes to deliver better results
Seeks feedback from others and makes necessary changes
Creates a process of gathering and acting on feedback
Integrates feedback and outside-in perspectives to drive positive impact
Deeply listens to feedback, continuously learns to up their game and creates positive impact

competencyPoints.title: Approaches setbacks as learning opportunities

behaviors.description: Shows willingness to learn and grow from setbacks
Maintains an optimistic outlook, reflects on challenges / learnings and shares the same with the team
Encourage teams to view setbacks as learning opportunities and enables them move forward
Builds people capability to bounce back from setbacks
Drives positive personal change to impact people and business

competencyFramework.competencyName: COLLABORATE AND PARTNER TO INSPIRE TRUST

competencyPoints.title: Values diverse perspectives, engages in difficult conversations with respect and fosters an inclusive workplace culture

behaviors.description: Recognizes and understands different points of view within the team
Participates in constructive discussions with colleagues, and handles disagreements respectfully
Facilitates difficult conversations with respect and empathy; considers others' views while making decisions
Promotes a culture where teams value and engage in discussions based on diverse perspectives
Drives initiatives that enhance the culture of inclusion in the organization

competencyPoints.title: Promotes transparency by communicating clearly and enhances authenticity by listening actively

behaviors.description: Listens attentively & expresses thoughts and views clearly
Engages the team and considers their views while making decisions
Promotes platforms that enable open dialogues and puts effort to understand others' emotions
Fosters authentic two-way communication across the organization
Creates organization wide platforms that enable transparent and open communication

competencyPoints.title: Be humble and vulnerable to inspire trust

behaviors.description: Seeks guidance and support when facing challenges
Accepts mistakes and is open to rectify the same
Shares personal growth stories with the team, creates opportunities for open discussions about failures and lessons learnt
Openly acknowledges and shares vulnerabilities; recognizes team members who demonstrate humility and openness
Actively cultivates trusting relationships on the foundation of humility

competencyPoints.title: Harnesses ecosystem and partnerships to achieve common goals with clear milestones

behaviors.description: Works effectively with the team and actively participates in initiatives
Collaborates across teams to achieve goals and builds relationships with different stakeholders
Leads cross-functional teams to co-create solutions; leverages industry networks to achieve common goals
Leverages network to support innovative projects, regularly reviews the progress to ensure achievement as per milestones
Spearheads strategic alliances within ABG and across the industry

competencyPoints.title: Drives creative and innovative solutions to resolve business and functional challenges

behaviors.description: Actively contributes ideas and attempts multiple ways to tackle work challenges
Tries new tools and techniques to solve problems and improve outcomes
Identifies opportunities and introduces new products, services & solutions
Creates industry first practices, to attain/maintain market leadership
Takes a bet on path breaking new projects and  drives its successful implementation

competencyPoints.title: Challenges the status quo and encourages risk-taking

behaviors.description: Questions existing practices and suggests innovative solutions
Works with the team to challenge the status quo, identifies & implements better ways of doing things
Empowers teams and recognizes innovation and risk-taking
Encourages teams and coaches them to challenge conventional ways and to draw learnings from high-risk experiments
Learns from failures; sponsors initiatives that celebrate risk-taking

competencyPoints.title: Encourages innovation by actively seeking diverse ideas and promoting experimentation

behaviors.description: Enthusiastically participates in new experiments
Regularly consults different teams to learn and gather new ideas
Provides resources for experiments and guides team in implementation by sharing feedback
Leverages synergies between different teams to experiment with emerging technologies and new processes
Drives innovation and experimentation as a core element of the organizational culture

competencyPoints.title: Embraces, explores and drives digital solutions in all aspects of work

behaviors.description: Learns and uses digital tools to improve efficiency and quality of work
Leads integration of digital technologies into own area of work
Builds capabilities of teams on emerging digital technologies
Seeks different avenues by looking at external digital trends and provides required tools & resources to the team
Acts as a patron for “digital-first” strategies, ensuring that people across levels embrace digital solutions to achieve competitive edge

competencyPoints.title: Drives team's development to build a healthy talent pipeline

behaviors.description: Actively participates in development activities to enhance skills
Identifies team capabilities, conducts developmental conversations and provides them with learning resources
Role models people development & coaches team members leading to building a robust talent pipeline
Take risk with internal ABG talent, develop talent through coaching & provides exposures/roles in other ABG businesses
Displays a coaching style of leadership and thus builds a robust and sustainable succession pipeline

competencyPoints.title: Delegates effectively and empowers team members actively

behaviors.description: Takes accountability for tasks and seeks learning opportunities
Delegates effectively, sets clear expectations, assigns tasks and responsibilities based on individuals' capabilities
Empowers team, facilitates open dialogues, listens carefully, and ensures everyone is heard
Empowers teams to take initiative, make decisions, and drive impact
Ensures decentralized decision-making, and accountability for outcomes

competencyPoints.title: Walks the talk through habits, practices and language that reflect respect for people, Group Values & Executive norms

behaviors.description: Imbibes & demonstrates ABG Group Values
Uses language that reflects respect for people, recognizes and reinforces ABG values in daily interactions and decision-making processes
Rewards members who exhibit Group Values and addresses instances of Value violation as per ABG norms
Role models the ABG values and inspires others through self conduct
Embeds respect for people, Group Values, & Group Purpose into the fabric of the organization

competencyPoints.title: Builds and leads diverse, multigenerational teams

behaviors.description: Harnesses the strength of the team by bringing out the best in others and themselves
Brings together diverse people and leverages their unique strengths to deliver outcomes
Implements initiatives that promote diverse teams; leads multi-generational teams
Builds multi generational, diverse teams
Builds a culture where leaders listen with empathy and authenticity

competencyPoints.title: Anticipates and shapes customers' stated and unstated needs and behaviors

behaviors.description: Proactively seeks input from various customers to understand their needs
Engages with customers, understands customer segment needs and clarifies them for the team
Understands various customer segments and their needs, aligns team’s efforts towards addressing the same
Partners with various customer segments to co-create solutions and strategies that address their needs
Makes strategic investments based on changing customer needs /preferences and create new segments for sustainable value creation

competencyPoints.title: Focuses on enhancing customer service and experience

behaviors.description: Provides exceptional customer service consistently and strives to find ways to enhance it
Builds relationships with the customer to strengthen partnership; reviews team's outcomes and progress to ensure optimal customer satisfaction
Creates strong strategies to significantly enhance customer delight and build competitive advantage
Encourages teams to create opportunities to differentiate the brand through unique customer experiences
Integrates customer insights into strategic plans and enhance customer experience at the organizational level

competencyPoints.title: Builds long-term relationships with customers on the foundation of trust

behaviors.description: Establishes trust with customers by addressing their concerns and responding promptly
Engages with customers to strengthen relationships and provides regular insights to the team
Focuses on means to deepen customer relationships, fostering trust and loyalty
Acts as a trusted advisor to foster loyalty and long-term partnerships with customers
Sponsors initiatives to strengthen ABG's credibility, enhance customer relationship and provide exceptional customer service

competencyPoints.title: Creates value for customers in a way that respects and preserves the well-being of our people and planet

behaviors.description: Actively seeks ways to minimize environmental impact in daily tasks, and takes keen interest in the areas of sustainability
Integrates sustainable practices into daily operations and decision-making
Identifies opportunities for reducing environmental impact and promoting social responsibility; participates in industry wide initiatives
Drives initiatives and allocates resources to create products, services, and processes that are sustainable and aligned with ABG's ESG goals
Sets ESG goals for the organization; engages with customers, influences industry leaders and policy makers to advocate for sustainable practices
